Product,, Pull Up Bar With Suspension Trainer,Magic Home Gym,"Rs 12,700.00","Rs 12,700.00","Rs 5,500.00","

column2: The original wall mounted Pull Up Bar  is a very rugged and heavy duty gadget for a serious upper body workout. The Pull Up Bar is scientifically designed to ensure maximum results. The Biomechanical design includes horizontal grips bent at a 15 degrees angle while the parallel grips are bent at 5 degrees angle. This is the only product on the market with these superior design features. The 3 feet bar is SINGLE PIECE for maximum strength. All conventional products have a two piece bar that compromises the strength of the product.
This bar is mounted on the wall with special ""wall anchor bolts"" that are supplied with the product.
Once mounted on the wall the bar can support a user weight of well over 100 Kgs.
This bar can be mounted at a suitable height so that the user can get a complete body stretch.
This pull up bar is ideal for all ages. A must for growing kids and adults alike.
The product is made from high grade mild steel and is powder coated for a superior finish.
Suspension Trainer

The Suspension Trainer is designed to provide a full body core workout. The trainer can be harnessed to the pull up bar or any other anchor point. The suspension trainer also has a ""door anchor"" that fits to any door.
This product combination will ensure that all muscle groups of the body are worked out and toned in a scientific manner.
This product combination will tone your muscles, correct posture and also help reduce weight. This is an ideal home workout solution for the entire family including growing children.
In addition to these we are offering huge type of pull up bars like wall mountened, top pulley, with ab straps, with benche press etc.
Please call 9880464602 for further details

Product,,Turbo Bench – 5 in 1 Home Gym,Magic Home Gym,"Rs 18,500.00","Rs 18,500.00","Rs 16,450.00","

column2: The Turbo Bench Home Gym is a complete workout solution that combines the benefits of plate weight resistance and free weights.
The gym has the following stations:
1.5 position workout bench 2.Preacher Curl  3.Leg Curl  4.Bench Press and 5. Top Pulley.
All stations are easily removable . The main bench can be folded for storage when not in use.
Bench – Can be used as a flat bench or in 5 incline positions. User friendly pin locking system. Thick contoured padding.
Preacher Curl- 3 position height adjustment to all users. Adequate padding for good under arm support. Has a removable rod cradle.
Leg Curl – Foam rollers for good foot support. Plate loaded resistance.
Bench Press- Can be used as a flat and inclined bench press. Two positions for rod cradle.

Top Pulley- Has two fiber reinforced double bearing pulleys and a strong 6 mm steel cable. Will have a long rod, short rod, extension chain and single arm strap handle for a variety of workouts. Plate load capacity – 60 Kgs
All parts are fabricated from a strong 1.5 inch tubular section that will last a lifetime.
Note – Weight plates and Rods shown are for illustration purpose only – not part of the offer.

column2: The Turbo Bench Home Gym is a complete workout solution that combines the benefits of plate weight resistance and free weights.
The gym has the following stations:
1.5 position workout bench 2.Preacher Curl  3.Leg Curl  4.Bench Press and 5. Top Pulley.
All stations are easily removable . The main bench can be folded for storage when not in use.
Bench – Can be used as a flat bench or in 5 incline positions. User friendly pin locking system. Thick contoured padding.
Preacher Curl- 3 position height adjustment to all users. Adequate padding for good under arm support. Has a removable rod cradle.
Leg Curl – Foam rollers for good foot support. Plate loaded resistance.
Bench Press- Can be used as a flat and inclined bench press. Two positions for rod cradle.

Top Pulley- Has two fiber reinforced double bearing pulleys and a strong 6 mm steel cable. Will have a long rod, short rod, extension chain and single arm strap handle for a variety of workouts. Plate load capacity – 60 Kgs
All parts are fabricated from a strong 1.5 inch tubular section that will last a lifetime.
Note – Weight plates and Rods shown are for illustration purpose only – not part of the offer.

column2: The challenger Mark 2 is a complete home gym that features a top pulley, bottom Pulley, bench press, squat rack, seated row, flat bench and slanted abdominal bench.

This home gym is designed toprovide a serious work out to all major muscle groups of the body. One can perform 30 plus workouts with this machine. The folding bench can be used separately as a flat bench or an abdominal board. When not in use the bench can be folded away to save space.
The gym can be used by up to three persons simultaneously if required.

The gym is loaded with standard weight plates for the top and bottom pulley workouts. The same plates can be used for the bench press rod. The pulley rack has a capacity of up to 100 kgs on metal plates and up to 60 kgs on rubber plates. Weight plates are to be procured separately; standard plates with a 28 mm bore can be used.
Note - weight plates are not part of the offer- for illustration purpose only

The product is flat packed and shipped to your doorstep via surface courier. Instruction manual and tool kit included in the packing. Assembly time is 15- 20 minutes.

column2: Heavy Duty Pull Up Bar With Top Pulley And Ab Straps
This is a revolutionary product from Home Gym Dynamics- makers of innovative home fitness equipment.
PULL UP BAR

This is biomechanically correct design pull up bar that has parallel grips bent at a 5 degree angle and main grips bent at 14 degrees. This scientific design ensures that there is no undue stress to the wrists while working out, thus avoiding injuries. The pull up bar is wall mounted with special ""wall anchors"" that are supplied with the product. This pull up bar is of ""Heavy Duty"" grade as the main bar is one piece without joints. This does not compromise on the weight carrying capacity and stability of the product. The bar will support up to 120 Kgs user weight.
TOP PULLEY
The product has a top pulley that can be used for shoulder, triceps, and chest and arm workouts. The accessories with the top pulley are:
1.Heavy duty 6mm steel cable. 2.Short Bar 3.Single grip handle. 4. Extension chain.
A variety of weights can be suspended to the cable like plates, dumbbells etc.
AB STRAPS

The specially designed removable AB Straps are cushioned for comfort and have steel hooks that can be suspended on the main bar or on the parallel bar for maximum effectiveness. Perform leg raise, knee raise, oblique raise workouts to get a perfectly sculpted abdomen.
This is a complete body workout system that can be used by all age groups and genders.
Please call us on 9880464602 for clarifications and details

column1: Main Rod – 36 inches, Brackets – 22 inches from wall. .Wall installation required - Wall anchors, spanner and manual included. AB Straps have foam padding for comfort. Product,,Turbo Bench with Preacher Curl and leg Raise,Magic Home Gym,"Rs 14,500.00","Rs 14,500.00","Rs 12,500.00","

column2: The Dumbbell Workout Bench with Preacher Curl and leg raise attachment is a five position bench that is designed for maximum comfort and utility. The bench can be used as a flat bench or in any of the five angled back positions. Convenient lever locking mechanism is provided for the back adjustment. The Preacher Curl Attachment has three height positions to suite users for various heights. The attachment can be removed when not in use. The leg raise attachment works on plate load resistance. Foam rollers provide a comfortable support to the feet.
The legs of the bench fold to make the bench completely flat for storage when not in use. The bench is made of strong gauge box tubing and has a thick long lasting cushion padding.
The contoured back shape provides maximum flex to the shoulder and chest muscles.
We provide a ""lifetime free replacement warranty"" on the frame against joint failures. The nonmetal parts carry a one year free replacement warranty.
Note – weight plates and rod are not part of the offer- for illustration purpose only.

column1: Seat - 9X11X15 inches . Back - 9X35X11 inches. Height - 20 inches
